TELL ME ABOUT DAVE: Oh jeez, what can I say about Dave? You gotta help me out by picking a topic. %[Career](postback:career) %[Podcast](postback:podcast) %[Required Reading](postback:requiredreading)
CAREER:
Dave is VP Emerging Trends & Technology at POP and he's been riding this crazy internet train for nearly 2 decades. Over the years he's worked with an amazing array of clients; Nintendo, Starbucks, HTC, Microsoft, just to name a few!
For the past few years he's really gotten into VR/AR/MR and bots and believes they are the future.
(And from my perspective as a bot, I'd have to agree.)
Wanna know more? %[Career Roles](postback:roles) %[Virtual Reality](postback:virtual_reality) %[HoloLens](postback:hololens)
You can always start over by saying HI.
CAREER ROLES:
OK, I hope you're sitting down. Dave started out as a web designer in 1996 which meant you wrote HTML too. Then FutureSplash appeared, Dave fell in love with it and became a bonafide flash developer.
BTW I'm not done yet. Wanna keep going? %[More Roles](postback:more_roles)
MORE ROLES:
Some years later, after launching literally hundreds of flash experiences Dave became a creative director and focused his efforts on games and entertainment.
Still not done yet. Wanna keep going? %[Even More Roles](postback:even_more_roles)
EVEN MORE ROLES:
*DEEP BREATH* OK. Following that, Dave created the Interactive team at POP, bringing JS, front-end, mobile and more devs together under one roof.
Believe me, I'm not trying to bore you, but THERE'S MORE. Wanna keep going? %[Yet More Roles](postback:yet_more_roles)
YET MORE ROLES:
And that brings up to today where Dave helps our clients understand the latest opportunities made available from emerging trends and technology.
Whew. That was a mouthful. And I didn't even mention how Dave ran all of POP's social media channels for like seven or eight years. DANG!
Say 'CAREER' if you wanna go down a different path.
PODCAST:
Like every third person on the planet, Dave has a podcast. It's called Say Something Worth Stealing and in it Dave gets creatives to talk about their careers and craft.
You should check it out! (And yes, that kittens link is a real URL. My creator... Mr. Funny-Pants.) %[http://kittens.design](http://kittens.design) %[SSWS on iTunes](http://saysomethingworthstealing.com/itunes)
REQUIRED READING:
OK, so Dave has been publishing a semi-weekly link pack for a while now, and now the latest issues are finally available to all!
Here's a link to Required Reading on the POP site: %[Required Reading](http://www.wearepop.com/topic/required-reading)
